definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart

sentences.english: Seahorses like to live in shallow waters amongst the seaweed and eelgrass.
sentences.chinese: 海马喜欢住在海藻或鳗草丛中的浅海。

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23号，但是我对号码不确定。

sentences.english: Some years ago, a good family moved into the third floor apartment of the tenement where we lived in the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我们住在布朗克斯时，三楼搬来一家新租户。

sentences.english: Yes, we can let you have a single room.
sentences.chinese: 有，我们能给您一间单人房住。

sentences.english: I live up north in the northern region, Lampang province.
sentences.chinese: 我住在北部地区南邦府的北部。

sentences.english: Once upon a barren moor there dwelt a bear, also a boar.
sentences.chinese: 从前，在一个贫瘠的荒野里住了一只熊和一只公野猪。

sentences.english: I lived in Asia for a few years.
The majority of them lived in rural areas in Fuyang City.
sentences.chinese: 这些患儿多数住在阜阳市的郊区。

sentences.english: That's John. He lives with the Wang family.
sentences.chinese: 那是约翰，他和王家的人住一起。

sentences.english: They lived a room facing the north thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 三十年前，他住在一个朝北的房间里。

sentences.english: Continue to hold the thermometer in place while taking his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 量体温的过程中要一直拿住体温计。

sentences.english: Q. Is the house the Cullens live in real?
sentences.chinese: 卡伦一家住的房子是有实体的吗？

sentences.english: Water went down his throat and he started to choke.
sentences.chinese: 水进入他的喉咙，他开始呛住了。

sentences.english: I will stay at the Hilton Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我将住在希尔顿大洒店。

sentences.english: The nuns live in a cloister of calm.
sentences.chinese: 修女们住在一个幽静的修道院里。

sentences.english: So how did we survive those three years of setbacks?
sentences.chinese: 我们是如何承受住那三年的挫折呢？

definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
to raise aloft with both hands/(of two or more people) to carry sth together
to carry on one's shoulder/(fig.) to take on (a burden, duty etc)

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
no thanks (used to politely but informally decline)
